Uses of Package
simplenlg.framework

  • Packages that use simplenlg.framework 
    Package Description
    simplenlg.aggregation  
    simplenlg.features
    The features package contains enumerated types that are used for specific features.
    simplenlg.format.english
    The format package currently contains only a single class, a plain text processor for English.
    simplenlg.framework
    The framework package contains the base components required for running the SimpleNLG package.
    simplenlg.lexicon  
    simplenlg.morphology.english
    This package contains the necessary classes for running the morphology processor for the English language.
    simplenlg.orthography.english
    The orthography package currently contains only a single class, the Orthography Processor for English.
    simplenlg.phrasespec  
    simplenlg.realiser.english  
    simplenlg.syntax.english
    This package contains the necessary classes for running the syntax processor for the English language.
    simplenlg.xmlrealiser  
  • Classes in simplenlg.framework used by simplenlg.aggregation 
    Class and Description
    ElementCategory
    This is the base interface for defining categories for the sub classes of NLGElement.
    NLGElement
    NLGElement is the base class that all elements extend from.
    NLGFactory
    This class contains methods for creating syntactic phrases.
    NLGModule
    NLGModule is the base class that all processing modules extend from.
  • Classes in simplenlg.framework used by simplenlg.features 
    Class and Description
    ElementCategory
    This is the base interface for defining categories for the sub classes of NLGElement.
  • Classes in simplenlg.framework used by simplenlg.format.english 
    Class and Description
    NLGElement
    NLGElement is the base class that all elements extend from.
    NLGModule
    NLGModule is the base class that all processing modules extend from.
  • Classes in simplenlg.framework used by simplenlg.framework 
    Class and Description
    CoordinatedPhraseElement
    This class defines coordination between two or more phrases.
    DocumentCategory
    This enumerated type defines the different types of components found in the structure of text.
    DocumentElement
    DocumentElement is a convenient extension of the base NLGElement class.
    ElementCategory
    This is the base interface for defining categories for the sub classes of NLGElement.
    LexicalCategory
    This enumeration defines the different lexical components.
    NLGElement
    NLGElement is the base class that all elements extend from.
    NLGFactory
    This class contains methods for creating syntactic phrases.
    PhraseCategory
    This enumeration defines the different syntactical phrases.
    WordElement
    This is the class for a lexical entry (ie, a word).
  • Classes in simplenlg.framework used by simplenlg.lexicon 
    Class and Description
    LexicalCategory
    This enumeration defines the different lexical components.
    WordElement
    This is the class for a lexical entry (ie, a word).
  • Classes in simplenlg.framework used by simplenlg.morphology.english 
    Class and Description
    InflectedWordElement
    This class defines the NLGElement that is used to represent an word that requires inflection by the morphology.
    NLGElement
    NLGElement is the base class that all elements extend from.
    NLGModule
    NLGModule is the base class that all processing modules extend from.
    WordElement
    This is the class for a lexical entry (ie, a word).
